alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PIERCE... SOUTHWESTERN BRANTLEY...NORTHEASTERN WARE AND NORTHWESTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blackshear to 6 miles north of Braganza to Waycross. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Boggy Bay, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Braganza, Race Pond, and Fort Mudge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Western Charlton
